captions.text: <i># Don't know much biology #
<i># Don't know much about a science book #

<i># Don't know much about</i>
<i>the French I took #
<i># But I do know that I love you #
<i># And I know that if you love me too #

<i># What a wonderful world</i>
<i>this would be #
<i># La ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta #

<i># History #
<i>#Mmm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm #

<i># Biology #
<i>#Oh, la ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta #

<i># Science book #
<i>#Mmm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm #

<i># French I took #
<i>#Yeah #
<i># But I do know that I love you #
<i># And I know that if you love me too #

<i># What a wonderful world</i>
<i>this would be ##</i>

I asked you never to speak to me again.
Now will you go away?

- [Neighing]
- Aah!
[Whinnying, Humming]

I do hope we're not interruptin'
anything, Mandy, honey.

Well, if you must know...
Eric was just leaving.

- Oh, no, I wasn't.
- I could make you leave if you ask...

Bluto! Hey!
Hey, I think you know everybody here.
Gregg, can't you...

No, don't worry. Just keep your hands
and feet away from his mouth.

Don't you have
any respect for yourself?
<i>This is absolutely gross!</i>
That boy is a P-l-G pig.

See if you can guess
what I am now.
Oh!
I'm a zit. Get it?

All right, you bastard,
let's go. Right here.

<i># Hey, baby, won't you take a chance #
[Yelling, Indistinct]
<i># Say that you, you can dance #
<i># Hey, dance #
<i># Hey, dance #
[Yelling]

<i>## [Music Continues, Indistinct]</i>
[Yelling]
Hey, why don't we go out tonight?

Otter, don't flatter yourself.
It wasn't that great.

<i># Let's dance #
[Mouthing Words]
Food fight!
[Students Screaming]

comments.author: Chuck.Raney Raney

comments.text:
+Chuck.Raney Raney
Edit: I realized it was a quote from Animal House. Me = fail. Kept the text 
below to prove my absolute failure.

 "But was it terrible when the Germans bombed Pearl Harbor ??" Umm, not to 
burst your bubble, but that wasn't the Germans. #HistoryNazi  

"I am NOT gonna SIT HERE and listen to you run down the USA." Everyone runs 
the USA down, even a lot of Americans, and that is fine. The many mistakes 
and idiots are made public and too much of their agenda interferes with the 
rest of the world. But all of the dissing doesn't matter as America is 
probably the most powerful nation in the world... so, there's that.
